meanings.sent1: She besmuts her hands while gardening.
meanings.sent2: The muddy dog besmuts the clean floor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy besmuts its paws in the fresh paint.
meanings.sent4: The careless child besmuts the pristine white walls with crayon marks.
meanings.sent5: The rain besmuts the once sparkling windows with streaks of dirt.

meanings.sent1: The besmuts shoes left tracks all over the carpet.
meanings.sent2: The old car was besmuts and in need of a wash.
meanings.sent3: The besmuts teddy bear looked like it had been on many adventures.
meanings.sent4: The besmuts blanket smelled of campfire smoke and earth.
meanings.sent5: The besmuts room had a musty odor that lingered in the air.
